description: The snap version can't find my vscode exec path. that could well be my fault, but when I type the path into the engine downloaded direct from the Godot Engine website it works like a charm. I wouldn't really call this one godot c# for that reason. For use with c# I give it 0 stars because I don't love the built in code editor for c#, but if you only care about GDscript i give it 4 stars, as Godot is a great little engine, but recommend you get the non-Mono version instead! Or you could download mono version from the Godot website.
summary: would absolutely recommend(if you only plan on using GDscript)!
